nodes.text: Huttese slime pods, a green food with red seasoning, were created by Artiodac chef Strono Tuggs after spending time on the planet Nal Hutta. When Tuggs visited Nal Hutta in search of exotic spices, he ran afoul of the Hutts and was captured. While successfully bartering his talents as a chef to secure his freedom, he was surprised to discover that slime pods, small creatures which floated in the swamps of Nal Hutta and were snacks for the Hutts, were delicious.

Although he was unable to collect any of the creatures in his haste to leave, they inspired him to create a dish that shared their name. After the Battle of Takodana in 34 ABY, he included the recipe for Huttese slime pods in his cookbook. He also served the dish in his traveling restaurant, Tuggs' Grub, while stationed in Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo on the Outer Rim planet Batuu.

Huttese slime pods were first mentioned in the 2019 recipe book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, which was authored by Chelsea Monroe-Cassel and Marc Sumerak. The out-of-universe ingredients are uncooked gnocchi, fresh spinach, shelled pistachios, minced garlic, olive oil, lime juice, peeled and pitted avocado, grated Parmesan cheese, heavy cream, salt, cannellini beans, and a garnish of sriracha.
